mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_code, c.quantity, c.product_code, p.product_name, p.product_option, p.image_url_fir, p.price, p.stock FROM cart c JOIN products p ON c.product_code = p.product_code WHERE c.user_code = #{userCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_code, user_code, product_code, quantity) VALUES (cart_code_seq.nextval, #{userCode}, #{productCode}, 1)

SELECT order_code_seq.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO orders (order_code, user_code, user_name, phone, address) VALUES (#{orderCode}, #{userCode}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{address})
INSERT INTO order_items (order_item_code, order_code, product_code, quantity, price) VALUES (order_item_code_seq.nextval, #{orderCode}, #{productCode}, #{quantity}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT order_code, user_code, user_name, phone, address, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_code = #{orderCode}
